meta.title: Complete Wheel Weight Production Line By YILSA
meta.description: YILSA offers advanced adhesive wheel weight production machinery. High-speed equipment (100k pcs/hr) with expert support & leading rotary punch technology.

production.title: Complete Wheel Weight Production Line
production.subtitle: From Raw Material to Finished Product - Integrated Production Solutions

speed.title: High Production Speed
speed.description: 4-8 times faster than traditional presses with continuous operation and automatic feeding system.

energy.title: Energy Efficiency
energy.description: 83,300 pieces/kWh vs competitor's 20,800 pieces/kWh, smaller motor requirements and lower operating costs.

quality.title: Superior Quality
quality.description: Burr-free cutting, clear marking, and precise weight control for optimal performance.

space.title: Space Efficiency
space.description: Compact design with vibration-free operation and flexible installation options.

rotary.title: Rotary Punch Technology
rotary.motion: Smooth operation with continuous rotary motion
